text: Scare Force One is an album from the Finnish hard rock/heavy metal band Lordi. == Track listing == # SCG7: Arm Your Doors and Cross Check - 1:35 # Scare Force Onen - 4:58 # How to Slice a Whore - 2:47 # Hell Sent in the Clowns - 4:20 # House of Ghosts - 4:12 # Monster Is My Name - 3:34 # Cadaver Lover - 3:51 # Amen’s Lament to Ra - 1:10 # Nailed by the Hammer of Frankenstein - 3:20 # The United Rocking Dead - 5:46 # She’s a Demon - 5:37 # Hella’s Kitchen - 1:10 # Sir, Mr. Presideath, Sir! - 5:44 Category:Lordi albums Category:2014 albums
title: Scare Force One
